title: Imperial College Gliding Club
text: Imperial College Gliding Club is the oldest, and one of the largest, university gliding clubs in the <a href="United%20Kingdom">United Kingdom</a>. Founded in 1930, the club was the second club to become affiliated to the <a href="British%20Gliding%20Association">British Gliding Association</a>, and has for most of its life flown from <a href="Lasham%20Airfield">Lasham Airfield</a> in Hampshire. The club maintains an archive website where details of the club's history since 1930 are kept.
